website_summaries.verdict: An instant charmer that comes with an ottoman to rest your legs and feet.
pros: Providing almost 20 inches of sitting space, this chair is adored not only for its price point, but whimsical fabric that further inspires one to dig deep into French literature
Smaller than other options, and fits into apartments and other spaces that may lack extra room
Ottoman adds an extra seat for entertaining
cons: A handful of reviews suggest the cushion could be softer and more comfortable overall

customer_reviews.title: Great chair overall
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair. Well, first when I saw the box I thought "Oh it seems so small". But after I opened it, the chair is big enough. It is a little small if you are a big/tall person, but otherwise great. Pros: Good design, comfortable arms and ottoman, takes little space since it is not huge Cons: Little small for bigger people, needs a seat cushion if you will sit to work or something for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: R. MB

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Not super soft and print will rub off ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is a you get what you pay for. Looks nice. Not super soft and print will rub off if you even slightly touch it. That's not the main issue. Seller didn't ship expedited. Put me in a major bind. They lied about shipping date and got caught. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: TheRockShop

customer_reviews.title: I really like it only had to screw on the legs
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it about two weeks, I got it for my bedroom. I really like it only had to screw on the legs. It's great looking and comfy. I've seen others cost way more than this one. Great price great chair and ottoman!!️!!️
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for my corner in my room
customer_reviews.text: Came a day early. It’s perfect for my corner in my room. Just what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dee P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, just not comfy but really cute, great for a smaller home or apartment
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, the material is a little bit different than the picture, thin, but looks very cute
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: These were very easy to put together (just screw the legs in)
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to put together (just screw the legs in). This is not a "super-comfy" chair, but comfortable enough to sit by the fire and watch a movie. I bought 2 and they look great in front of the fireplace. They look exactly as pictured. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawley

customer_reviews.title: who puts plastic legs on a furniture like this one
customer_reviews.text: The ad says that it comes with birch wood legs. Mine came with plastic legs. First of all, who puts plastic legs on a furniture like this one? Second of all, one leg was already broken (to prove the previous what I said). Seller never responded. Ended up returning the item. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good size but not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The size and pattern are perfect for my needs. However, it is a bit hard on one's bottom. I use a pillow to sit on and I'm confortable
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: A Nervous Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous purchasing this item due to a few reviews i’ve seen where the chair arrived hosting mold. But I opened the box immediately upon arrival to find this really nice chair intact. Super easy to assemble, just screw in the legs. I will now order another one to complete my entryway set. Got a few compliments so far. The color is not white btw, it is a off white linen type of color. Update: 7 Mar 19 My second chair arrived, that’s right! I had to order another because the first one was just that awesome 👏🏽!! No issues at all. Both chairs arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: LazyMarine

customer_reviews.title: Beware of printing imperfections in the pattern and ripping on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The product came with an imperfection on the pattern. The pattern on the back of the chair has weird white lines where looks like there was a printing error. The pattern on the ottoman is not centered. When you put the legs on the chair they hang over the back and rip the bottom fabric. I ordered this chair because I liked the pattern. Comfort level is fine, not great but I didn't expect a super comfortable chair at this price. Overall, it's a pretty disappointing chair and I wouldn't want to display it in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & totally stylish
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my home office, it looks great! I find it comfortable, more on the firm side, I like that I don't sink into the chair when I sit down. Super easy to assemble. Getting lots of compliments from clients.
customer_reviews.author: Merchmezz

customer_reviews.title: As Pretty As The Picture.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful chair. It's firm but comfortable. I'm using it as a reading chair in my morning room. I haven't notice the writing rubbing off, but I will be spraying it with a fixative just in case some of the other reviews I have read are true.
customer_reviews.author: Shelliep

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The chair and ottoman are BOTH hard and not comfortable. If returning these large items weren’t so much trouble, I’d do it. The pattern looks okay. It’s now in my formal living room, but I am moving both to the den downstairs. Not high enough quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Small
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I opened the box. This chair looks like a child's set. It doesn't look right in the living room with regular size furniture. I gave it 3 stars because the fab6is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Livingston

customer_reviews.title: I would have love this to have worked
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, first the otto broke. I return the foot hoping to get a replacement. It never came. Then the chair broke it's just sitting on the floor in the corner. I would have love this to have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Abika

customer_reviews.title: These chairs look very nice. They are simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look very nice. They are simple to put together, just screw the legs on. I subtracted one star because they are not very comfortable. As other reviews said they are more of a cream or off white than a bright white.
customer_reviews.author: monkeemommie

customer_reviews.title: Cute Accent Piece...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to fill a corner in a room and it does this wonderfully. There is a section where one side of the fabric is a shade lighter- not sure how that happened, but not so much that I’d return it. Great teal color and just dang cute! I thought the description said the legs were wood but the are definitely plastic. I don’t anticipate a lot of use, so again, not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hester

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, good size
customer_reviews.text: Pros: looks nice, good size, comfortable. cons: bad odor, poor foam quality of the seat, the ottoman has no storage function.
customer_reviews.author: rocklife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space to sit. Not too firm or too soft. Comfortable. Direction for attaching legs could be a little better. Still looks like I have 1/2 of them on backwards. Background is light cream with black writing.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly. Color looks a little darker than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly. Color looks a little darker than the white in picture. It is more like a linen. Some people said cushion was too hard, but my dad was snoring it within 30minutes, sat through hours of football comfortably. Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: Toria

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: So it's not what I expected. I thought it was going to be white! Turns out it's more of a beige or deep off white. Which really is disappointing because I was designing my concept around this chair and it being white and black. This is really my only complaint but they need to specify that it's not white!
customer_reviews.author: RedSilk Media Group, Corp

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Buy It!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We bought a pair for the kids, but as a full-sized adult I can fit it quite comfortably, too. It is very sturdy. The ottoman is top heavy and will tip easy, which is something I noticed because of small children (who may want to climb on or sit on it). That doesn't affect this rating though, and I would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Diabla

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for the price. It’s more comfortable than I initially thought but it’s not a lush and soft cushion. The cushion is attached and doesn’t separate from the chair. The one thing I really didn’t like was that it arrived with a smudge and stain. Hopefully I’ll be able to wipe/scrub it off, but otherwise it’s a nice chair set.
customer_reviews.author: Mastaquake

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made But Small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive set and seems well made. The shipping was quick and the packaging was high quality. Unfortunately, the chair was far too small for me--I'm not a large person, but I like to curl up or sit cross-legged to read or work on crafts, and there's no way to do that in this chair. I would also agree with some of the other reviews I saw that the seat cushioning is not very soft. I'd consider it more suitable as an occasional chair or dressing chair than a chair that will receive constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and unsturdy.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars I would. Bought for my bedroom, so wasn't expecting a lot of use. BEWARE the chair leg broke after sitting in it four times. At 170lbs I dont think that should happen. Also if you need to clean the fabric DO NOT use water or scrub it the print comes right off and smudges the fabric. Peice of junk it the dumpster in less thank three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Moore

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this chair and the ottoman is just the right ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair and the ottoman is just the right size, Chair is roomy and appears to be very comfortable (just got it and haven't sat in it for very long) but I love the look and feel of it. Looking for another one for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CUTE, COMPACT, NOT COMFORTABLE CUSHION, EASY ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: The chair came in a big box conveniently packaged. The ottoman was nicely placed on top of the chair in the box with a foam wrap on both items, in which you just had to put the feet on the bottom of the chair and ottoman. Very simple. The chair is cute, but not comfortable. The sit is hard and needs a pillow for your back, but it looks very nice. Very small and compact and fits in a little space easy. Now I need a cushion and a pillow for my back. But worth the money. Not five rate because not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Paschall

customer_reviews.title: Item came damaged and the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Not much good to say here. The chair and ottoman came, it was the wrong color. It also had dirt/grease marks on the arm. And as if all that was not bad enough, it is really uncomfortable. Like if I took a rock, and adding some padding and then put fabric over it, this is how I imagine it would feel. On the positive side, the company stood behind their product and issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair for Any Room
customer_reviews.text: Love my new office chair. It's a little low, but once you sit in it and put your feet up, its really comfortable. Takes up little space and just right when you need that extra chair in your office, or other living space.
customer_reviews.author: Demery Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Its still a beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to be white & black. It's beige & black. Its still a beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Great for a small person. Add a pillow and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfling1331

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with spills
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but be careful with spills. Even a little water will make the ink bleed. That doesn't really scream quality, but fortunately it still blends well into the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: csan1

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product! Its flimsingly made. The wood it's made with is cheap. I've barely had it 30 days and the wood is ripping apart. Everytime you sit in it, it cracks and splits even more! The ottoman is hard to sit on. There is no cushion in between. It's just covered with fabric. I wanted this cause I thought it was beautiful and made of quality. Sad to say I was wrong! Save your money! Do not buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but firm
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be of good quality, don't notice any defects (good thing about a pattern with a lot going on). Holds weight well, over 300 lbs and is a good size. But loses a star because as others have mentioned, it is extremely firm.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair! Although not a super comfy chair, it adds flair to any room and is a great solid reading chair. Plus it shipped and arrived right on time. Great to put into any corner and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waiste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is for a smaller person but also one of the leg screw was stripped so I had to get one & then the whole chair just started falling apart. I’m a small person myself so it wasn’t due to weight limit. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chair for very long and already the chair has sunken in from where I sit and I'm NOT overweight by any means. Cheaply made and the leg stands keep unscrewing. Do not buy this product!!!!! It's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: S. J.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is cute and looks good in any space, but it is not good for anything more than show. It’s not comfortable at all. The ottoman feels like nothing more than wood with fabric over it. The chair is hard to sit in for more than a few minutes. Also, it’s cheaply made and not durable. My dog ran into the chair one day and the front two legs broke. I’ve tried contacting the seller with not luck. Definitely would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Justice N.

customer_reviews.title: MOLD Growing On the Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and immediately smelled MOLD! The ottoman has yellow and peach stains and a huge visible mold growth! See attached pictures!
customer_reviews.author: IrishMama

customer_reviews.title: It looks great in my room
customer_reviews.text: It looks very cute in my room. The only thing is you get what you paid for, it is very stiff not so cushiony as one would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Cute Chair & matching Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This chair & matching Ottoman was delivered very quickly. Its very cute and fits perfectly in my small space. I gave it 4 star only because it isn't very soft to sit in with out a cushion, but my grandson loves it and I love it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Niquie

customer_reviews.title: It does a lot of noise.
customer_reviews.text: It is cute, but does a lot of noises, cranky!! And it is mot white, more like a bege what does not bothers me, but I am not a big fun of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jheff

customer_reviews.title: Cozy office
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. It looks really cute in my office and I get tons of compliments on how cute it is!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Chair & foot stool
customer_reviews.text: These are strictly for show. Have to add cushions to sit on and lean back on. Feels like you are sitting on boards. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Seat is very firm, but it's comfortable. My favorite chair to sit in at the cabin!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair, but hard bottom!
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little chair for my bedroom but the cushion is not soft at all. It feels like I'm sitting on a board.
customer_reviews.author: kitten

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my mom to seat and watch TV as she does not like to watch TV from her bed. She likes it, I t looks good, I dont have a better picture now.... but this is how my princess enjoy it as well
customer_reviews.author: Thaimy Blandino

customer_reviews.title: Basic quality
customer_reviews.text: Screwed came stripped. Frame makes noise. I'm 170lbs. You get what you pay for. It does what it's suppose to. The seller worked with me as far as parts cost which I couldn't find anywhere after the fact. Honestly wishing I sent it back before accepting partial refund. Small colored fabric in material. Only noticed when up close.
customer_reviews.author: Sosha

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an adorable accent chair and ottoman. It’s not as big as I was hoping for but it’s comfortable for me being 5’7”.
customer_reviews.author: Fire_Rust

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly in the space I needed it for. It was in my budget. I use it to study. It’s not amazingly comfortable but you get what you pay for. Fast delivery. Also impressed with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R

customer_reviews.title: Great to curl up in and read 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unpack and put legs on. Really cute and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: pamm fast

customer_reviews.title: This is a darling chair, works for the style ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling chair, works for the style and price but a little stiff in the cushion, hopefully it breaks in a little. Otherwise 5 stars. Put a lumbar pillow and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bell-Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo cute.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be small and hard but it is plenty roomy and quite comfy so I love it. Perfect for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute in our den. Will be used as extra seating iwhen we have company. It is firm but comfortable. It was delivered in 2 days. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: RSMCATHY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this chair. It has a weight limit of almost 400 pounds, but it is really sized for a smaller person or child. The cushions are hard and not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Reich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accent Chair
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect choice for a bedroom accent chair. It has its own charm and is fairly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! We love the versatile options of bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! We love the versatile options of bedroom, office, child's room etc. It is all that we expected & more. Speedy delivery! Thank you & God bless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POORLY MADE.... DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY..... chair will not last more than a year... Poorly made... Inside leg broke less than year.. Customer was good when I got item because there was issues when got it.. They offers partial refund so didn't send back etc. Almost year later no warranty leg breaks inside the chair. Have to pay $75 to get fixed.. Customer service will do nothing now...
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This chair fits perfect in my small apartment. Exactly as pictured and it came fast. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexarra

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The chair and the ottoman arrived together and were easy to put together. The chair and the ottoman are solidly built. The legs are made of wood. This was important to me because I have wood floors and did not want to have them scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cute accent to your place
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest accent addition to my new home. I love turqoiuse and I love the fact all I had to do was to screw the legs on. So simple and so chic. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ATARAH SAMAROO

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for the money. Wont take a lot of abuse or hold up to kids or animals. I dont have either so it will last longer than others. Creaks a little in certain spots but not a huge deal. I'd buy again all and all
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good piece of furniture for the price Durable - functionable - and SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but short in height. Good for small area
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this !!! I plan to purchase another !!
customer_reviews.author: MrsPerez2008

customer_reviews.title: not a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: it sits relative low and I am not a tall person. not a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality -- both pieces came in same box - just had to screw legs on each piece - easy! Very nice size ... may have to order another!
customer_reviews.author: Kim J

customer_reviews.title: but small and not very comfortable. The legs to the chair
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Chair is very cute, but small and not very comfortable. The legs to the chair, even though they were not assembled and were in a bag, were pretty scuffed up. It suits me because it's more for decorative reasons than to sit on, but if it were a chair that I was going to relax in often, it would not work because it is only slightly more comfortable than sitting on a carpeted floor. My rating is 4 stars because it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: DCA

customer_reviews.title: Nice reading or coloring chair.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new reading chair! It is firm which is what my chiropractor wanted and really comfortable. The only thing I was not pleased with was watching on the side,the fabric was puckered and gathered. Not smooth.
customer_reviews.author: angela fowler

customer_reviews.title: Thought price was to good. Practically no cushion and legs are a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair and stool and ok quality. Thought price was to good. Practically no cushion and legs are a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Wm

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not white but still looks good in the room! Will spray will scotch guard to keep it from staining
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! It’s not super large or heavy to move. I appricated the extra parts that came with it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: items arrived with broken legs and un easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: items arrived with broken legs and un easy to assemble. the chair is beautiful, however he cushions of the chair is not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cute chair, hard as a rock there is no paddling in chair or foot rest.. for looks not sitting ..
customer_reviews.author: shandon

customer_reviews.title: Sexy chair for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Cute chair for the bedroom, very comfortable and easy to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: kimita24

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set as a gift and it has become the recipients favorite curl up chair. Looks lovely fits well with multiple décor styles and is very well made. Looking at the chaise next.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it yesterday easy to put together love it. extra chair in my family room. love the ottoman!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Just wish it was a tad bit bigger but no complaints love it
customer_reviews.author: Rekita Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to my office
customer_reviews.text: This chair has been a hit in my office! All my coworkers come by and sit and gush over the comfort. It is a little snug, so not very comfortable for larger individuals. It provides perfect comfort as I’m sitting through counseling sessions. The color perfectly accents the grey chairs already in my office. Now to find my perfect rug
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for here. Looks fine and isn't too uncomfortable, but one of the legs broke through the bottom off the chair after being sat in only 5 or 6 times.
customer_reviews.author: Calebjk

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: I can’t to be on it fo more than 30 minutes, Is to hard. I love the way it looks. Wish it was more confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as you think.. but great chair.
customer_reviews.text: I redid my office from floor to ceiling, I got this for a reading chair! I love it! It's not as comfortable as I was hoping but it works great in my office and I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: This chair is too small for area I purchased it for but it's so cute I can't send it back. Will use in a bedroom. It's also pretty firm but for the price can't beat the cuteness of it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: A great price for a solid chair! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This chair came in two days! It’s adorable and for the price, looks a lot more expensive than it was. Very easy to put the legs on.
customer_reviews.author: MomofFour

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so cute. And the company is amazing to work with. I had ordered 2 and one of the ottomans came with some damage, which they took care of right away. I LOVE how they finish off the room.
customer_reviews.author: tonya dwire

customer_reviews.title: dirty and smelling
customer_reviews.text: it arrived dirty and with pee on it. maybe from a dog. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sophie S.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and classy
customer_reviews.text: I love these very much, so affordable for a cozzy look. Just that i couldnt fix the wood legs because one of the fixing screw was out of sync. So i kept without those.
customer_reviews.author: Nive

customer_reviews.title: No removable cushion :
customer_reviews.text: The chair and ottoman are a perfect size for my apartment. My problem is , the cushion is not removable like it says it is , and the seat is very hard. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rob L.

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Very happy with this product. Nice quality and fits our theme perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Really small Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but It looks like a little kids chair and ottoman compared to the rest of my furniture,. Not really sure if I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Eaves

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The exact color they showed and very comfortable. Goes with the color of our room
customer_reviews.author: shantell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is no cushion on this chair. And it showed up with a stain
customer_reviews.author: Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and is super comfortable. Not too large for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair... It's so cute and comfy...I'm 5'1 and fit right into the chair.
customer_reviews.author: emmie lou

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just a little hard would like a little more cushion. Great size for dorm and when not in use you can free some room up,by putting stool in chair.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Demchak

customer_reviews.title: We have some European details scattered around and this chair is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: She fits perfectly in my Hair Salon!!! We have some European details scattered around and this chair is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair, but has no cushion support, but it’s a nice decorative piece of furniture for my daughter’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully light and fit in my small den
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully light and fit in my small den. Would recommend it. However, if you like softer padded chairs, it is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: and since I have two other chairs like it, I'll use it often
customer_reviews.text: I stage homes. This really fit the bill in an office I staged, and since I have two other chairs like it, I'll use it often!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ouellet
